originalText.text: I had multiple, very lengthy conversations with Arthur about scheduling an appointment for my hair color.  After flying in from Tokyo and heading to the shop as agreed, I was notified that despite a pricing agreement, sending photos, and agreement on a $650 color for my hair, I was advised that he never actually put the appointment on his books.  Therefore, the one day I have available to get my hair colored I won't be getting it done!

originalText.text: Arthur & D Hair Salon is the absolute best! I can always count on Arthur to give me an incredible haircut that my friends and family rave about. He is attentive and focused during each session, and I'm amazed by his skill and the consistent quality of his work. Arthur is like a stylist virtuoso-- just when I think he is finished, he makes a few more snips here, a comb-spray-cut combo there, and boom! He's gone the extra mile to make me look and feel like a million bucks, every time. I have been a loyal customer for years now, and can confidently say that the service I receive here is really the best there is! Grateful for my haircuts here, thank you so much Arthur! Now it's time to book my next appointment! :)

originalText.text: I don't typically leave reviews, but I had the most wonderful experience at this salon for my cut and color! At first I was skeptical because I didn't know what to expect as the salon is small in size and it was just Arthur who was there. But I was blown away at how professionally and intricately Arthur tended to my hair. I was nervous as I was trying out a new hair style and Arthur nailed it perfectly and it came out even better than I imagined. I also felt the pricing was more than fair and I would recommend this salon to all my girlfriends!

originalText.text: Arthur did a great job cutting and blow drying my hair. I was visiting NYC from out of town and he managed to work me into his busy schedule on the same day I called for an appointment. If he'd had the time, I would have had him color my hair as well. His salon , located in East Village, is small, comfortable and elegant. He took the time to talk with me thoroughly before he cut my hair. I was playing with the idea of getting a really short haircut. After talking with me he said I wasn't ready to get my hair cut that short. He said I had to be a million percent certain that I wanted to make such a bold change. I realized when he'd finished cutting my hair and it was still medium-length that he was absolutely right. I love the style and and would gladly return to him again. As I left his salon, I mentioned to my Sweetie, I was going to have to move to NYC so Arthur could continue cutting my hair. And I meant it.
